name: Memories of Winter
description:
You seem to have a trouble remembering where you are, but you are in a camp of other survivors. You're safe but... you don't remember how you got there. You remember the nuclear winter and you remember the darkness... but that is all... Is it fine here or is something more sinister at hand.

Memories of Winter is a Maximum Apocalypse RPG pamphlet adventure that requires some investigation and roleplay to find out what's really going on.
